articles.title: Taliban take Kabul, President Ashraf Ghani flees, America absconds - The Indian Express
articles.description: This is the first time since their ouster 20 years ago in the wake of the 9/11 strikes that Taliban fighters have entered the city — they first seized the Capital in 1996. Late at night, fighters in pickups and SUVs did victory rounds in the heart of Kabul.
articles.content: Kabul, the ultimate prize in every Afghanistan war, fell to the Taliban Sunday, completing their takeover of the country in a lighting offensive that saw provinces and warlords give up without a figh… [+2155 chars]

articles.author: Zeke Miller, Jonathan Lemire and Josh Boak
articles.title: Biden team surprised by rapid Taliban gains in Afghanistan - CTV News
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden and other top U.S. officials were stunned on Sunday by the pace of the Taliban's nearly complete takeover of Afghanistan, as the planned withdrawal of American forces urgently became a mission to ensure a safe evacuation.
articles.content:

articles.author: Gillian Brockell
articles.title: The fall of Saigon: As Taliban seizes Kabul, the Vietnam War's final days remembered - The Washington Post
articles.description: In 1975, Saigon fell to the North Vietnamese faster than expected, leading to chaos and  to the largest helicopter airlift ever attempted to rescue hundreds of Americans and South Vietnamese, who scaled the embassy's walls.
articles.content: Thats what Ford faced on the evening of April 28, 1975, and it is history repeating itself now. After 20 years of U.S. involvement, the Taliban entered the Afghan capital, Kabul, on Sunday morning, a… [+4885 chars]

articles.title: Afghan forces surrender Bagram air base to Taliban - Economic Times
articles.description: Bagram district chief Darwaish Raufi said Sunday that the surrender handed the one-time American base over to the insurgents.

articles.title: Ford GT Heritage Edition debuts at Monterey signalling end of production - Carmag South Africa
articles.description: A modern interpretation of the original, the Ford GT Heritage Edition pays homage to the 1964 Ford GT prototypes that led to America’s only Le Mans-winning supercar, a Le Mans champion from 1966 to 1969, and again in 2016.
